```py
>>> idx = pd.MultiIndex.from_product([(0, 1, 2), ('green', 'purple')],
...                                  names=["number", "color"])
>>> idx
MultiIndex([(0,  'green'),
 (0, 'purple'),
 (1,  'green'),
 (1, 'purple'),
 (2,  'green'),
 (2, 'purple')],
 names=['number', 'color'])
>>> idx.drop([(1, 'green'), (2, 'purple')])
MultiIndex([(0,  'green'),
 (0, 'purple'),
 (1, 'purple'),
 (2,  'green')],
 names=['number', 'color']) 
```
